command:
function createDb() {
                          local dbname="$1"

                          until errmsg=$(psql -h postgres-0 --username=cnadmin --dbname=cantonnet -c "create database $dbname" 2>&1); do
                          if [[ $errmsg == *"already exists"* ]]; then
                              echo "Database $dbname already exists. Done."
                              break
                          fi

                          echo "trying to create postgres database $dbname, last error: $errmsg";
                          sleep 2;
                          done
                        }

                        createDb participant_3_00
createDb participant_3_01
createDb participant_3_02
createDb participant_3_03
createDb participant_3_04
createDb participant_3_05
createDb participant_3_06
createDb participant_3_07
createDb participant_3_08
createDb participant_3_09
initContainers.name: pg-init
